name: Baby Mom Dressup Beauty Girl Games
name_original: Baby Mom Dressup Beauty Girl Games
description:
Taking care of kids is hard, especially when there's a baby involved!

The young mother seems to be in trouble.Help these girls have a little play time with Babysitter Makeup - Girls Dress & Baby Care a fun dress up game for kids! Make their play time a little easier by dressing them in cute outfits. Choose from shirts, dresses, skirts, shoes, jewelery and other accessories, all designed to make the girls look as cute as can be. Create and change outfits until they look perfect!

Along with playing dress up, you also need to give makeovers to these girls! Add makeup and cute hairstyles to complete their playful yet responsible look. Once their outfit is complete, it's time to take care of those babies. Dress them up, too, then head into the play room for a little fun time!
